plot outline: Bobbili Simham is a 1994 Telugu-language action drama film, produced by Trivikram Rao under the Vijayalakshmi Art Pictures banner and directed by A. Kodandarami Reddy. It stars Nandamuri Balakrishna, Meena, Roja in the lead roles and music composed by M. M. Keeravani.
title: Bobbili Simham
plot: _Bobbili Simham_ (qv) is a 1994 Telugu-language action drama film, produced by Trivikram Rao under the Vijayalakshmi Art Pictures banner and directed by A. Kodandarami Reddy. It stars Nandamuri Balakrishna, Meena, Roja in the lead roles and music composed by M. M. Keeravani.
